entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
